description: Dark gray merino wool boot socks

core:description.text: Premium dark gray merino wool boot socks engineered for comfort during extended wear. The cushioned sole provides impact absorption while the reinforced heel and toe areas ensure long-lasting durability. Natural merino fibers offer superior moisture-wicking and temperature regulation, keeping feet dry and comfortable in any conditions. The mid-calf height provides protection from boot chafing while the elastic arch support ensures a secure fit.
